select id,cateGoryName,parentCateGory,cateGoryCode from ProductCategory p1 left join ProductCategory p2 on p1.id=p2.parentCateGory where p1.parentCateGory = #{id} order by ID
select CateGoryName from ProductCategory where ParentCateGory= (select ID from ProductCategory where FIND_IN_SET(id,(select ProductCategory from Products where id=#{companyId}))>0 and CateGoryCode=3)

select id,cateGoryName,parentCateGory,cateGoryCode,parentCateGory from ProductCategory where
parentCateGory = #{id}
parentCateGory is null
order by ID

SELECT CateGoryName FROM (SELECT ID, CateGoryName FROM ProductCategory WHERE ParentCateGory = (SELECT ID from ProductCategory where FIND_IN_SET(ID,(select ProductCategory from Products where id = #{productId} )) and CateGoryCode = '3')) as t1 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(t1.ID,(select ProductCategory from Products where id = #{productId} ))
select id,cateGoryName,parentCateGory,cateGoryCode from ProductCategory order by ID
select id,cateGoryName,parentCateGory,cateGoryCode from ProductCategory where parentCateGory=#{id}

SELECT id, cateGoryName,parentCateGory,cateGoryCode FROM ProductCategory WHERE parentCateGory = #{cateGoryId} OR ( parentCateGory IN ( SELECT id FROM ProductCategory WHERE parentCateGory = #{cateGoryId} ) AND cateGoryCode = 1) OR ( parentCategory IN ( SELECT id FROM ProductCategory WHERE parentCateGory IN ( SELECT id FROM ProductCategory WHERE parentCateGory = #{cateGoryId} ) AND cateGoryCode = 1 ) )

select id,brandName,logoPath,isHomeShow from ProductBrand where isHomeShow=1 and FIND_IN_SET(id,(select GROUP_CONCAT(productBrandID SEPARATOR ',') from Products where ProductCategory=#{id})) order by ID

SELECT id,productName,productType,productBrandID,unitPrice,productInfo,productCategory,isHomeShow,isSubPageShow,isHotShow FROM Products where IsSubpageShow=1 and FIND_IN_SET(#{id},productCategory) limit 4

SELECT id,productName,productType,productBrandID,unitPrice,productInfo,productCategory,isHomeShow,isSubPageShow,isHotShow FROM Products where IsHotShow=1 and FIND_IN_SET(productCategory,(select GROUP_CONCAT(ID SEPARATOR ',') from ProductCategory where ParentCateGory=#{id} GROUP BY ParentCateGory)) order by ID limit 10
select id,cateGoryName,parentCateGory,cateGoryCode from ProductCategory WHERE parentCateGory is null order by ID
select id,cateGoryName,parentCateGory,cateGoryCode from ProductCategory WHERE parentCateGory IN ( SELECT id FROM ProductCategory WHERE parentCateGory is null ) order by ID
